content: single_crochet 42 fold the circle in half and run a row of stitches along the seam will crease the mouth attach cardboard / plastic to the side of the mouth that will be inside the head do not fo or cut your yarn off see assembly notes to attach the mouth assembly notes i stuck all of my pipe cleaners into the body when i reached ~ round 21 of the body this is also when i made all of the other parts so i could fit my fingers into it to sew it all together then i made the eye stalks and slid them onto the pipe cleaners and used the tails to sew them onto the body photo of head with pipe cleaners attached sewed the main eye onto the body and used a small safety eye in the center of it then i cut out half-circle pieces of cardboard for each half of the mouth used needle and thread to sew it onto the mouth check me out on ravelry or give me a follow on instagram pinterest or tumblr i d love to see your finished creation you can post or submit it one on of my social media sites or email it to knottycritters@gmail com to attach the mouth put the inside of mouth piece in the opening in the head piece you will crochet into the stitches of the head and inside of mouth at the same time inside of mouth after stitching middle seam inside of mouth after attaching some cardboard i hope you ve enjoyed this pattern please let me know how it went my info is at the bottom of the page i d love to see what you ve done check me out on ravelry or give me a follow on instagram pinterest or tumblr i d love to see your finished creation you can post or submit it one on of my social media sites or email it to knottycritters@gmail com
